Term.Name: Deeplink
Term.Definition: The link to be able to 'deep-link' into a particular section of the application.

Term.Name: Deeplink for DayPass
Term.Definition: The link to be able to 'deep-link' into a particular section of the daypass application.

Term.Name: Trigger
Term.Definition: The trigger to start the application.

Term.Name: Toaster Message
Term.Definition: Multi-lingual text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user.

Term.Name: Toaster Message NL
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in Dutch.

Term.Name: Toaster Message EN
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in English.

Term.Name: Toaster Message GA
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in Irish.

Term.Name: Toaster Message DE
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in German.

Term.Name: Toaster Message FR
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in French.

Term.Name: Toaster Message IT
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in Italian.

Term.Name: Toaster Message ES
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in Spanish.

Term.Name: Toaster Message PL
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in Polish.

Term.Name: Toaster Message HU
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in Hungarian.

Term.Name: Toaster Message CZ
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in Czech.

Term.Name: Toaster Message SK
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in Slovak.

Term.Name: Toaster Message RO
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in Romanian.

Term.Name: Toaster Message TR
Term.Definition: Text of the "toaster"-message that will be shown to the user in Turkish.

Term.Name: Toaster Image
Term.Definition: Image URL of the "toaster"-image that will be shown to the user.

Term.Name: Promotional Image
Term.Definition: Image URL of the promotional background image that will be shown to the user when user tunes to an unsubscribed MySports channel.

Term.Name: Delay
Term.Definition: The time between tuning to a channel and showing the toastermessage.

Term.Name: Display Time
Term.Definition: Time a toastermessage should be shown on the screen.

Term.Name: Repeat
Term.Definition: Amount of times a "toastermessage" should be repeated.

Term.Name: Interval
Term.Definition: The interval between two subsequent "toatser"-messages.

Term.Name: Channel Bound
Term.Definition: List of channel-ids the application is bound to.

Term.Name: Allowed Overlay Apps
Term.Definition: List of applications that are allowed as overlay over the channel.

Term.Name: App Logo
Term.Definition: The picture displayed when tuned to the channel for the period (delay) until the app is launched.

Term.Name: Poster Logo
Term.Definition: The picture displayed in the Info Panel as channel related Poster.

Term.Name: Synopsis
Term.Definition: Multi-lingual text of the synopsis displayed in the Info Panel to the user.

Term.Name: Synopsis NL
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in Dutch.

Term.Name: Synopsis EN
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in English.

Term.Name: Synopsis GA
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in Irish.

Term.Name: Synopsis DE
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in German.

Term.Name: Synopsis FR
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in French.

Term.Name: Synopsis IT
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in Italian.

Term.Name: Synopsis ES
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in Spanish.

Term.Name: Synopsis PL
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in Polish.

Term.Name: Synopsis HU
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in Hungarian.

Term.Name: Synopsis CZ
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in Czech.

Term.Name: Synopsis SK
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in Slovak.

Term.Name: Synopsis RO
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in Romanian.

Term.Name: Synopsis TR
Term.Definition: Text of the synopsis that will be shown to the user in Turkish.

Term.Name: Replay App ID
Term.Definition: This the id of the APP used for Startover and/or Catchup TV.

Term.Name: Replay App Channel ID
Term.Definition: This is the channel specific reference ID used to initiate playout from the start of the event currently being broadcasted.
